definition: reference book consisting of material quoted from many sources, arranged by category (about 600 of which were compiled between the 3rd and 18th centuries in China)
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: In the official history, encyclopedia belonged to different classifications between Han Dynasty and Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在正史史志目錄中，漢宋之間類書所屬歸類不同。

sentences.english: Jian Ming Yuan was compiled by Yuan Nian who was Buddhist monk in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《兼名苑》是唐代僧人釋遠年編纂的類書。

sentences.english: The bookstore doesn't handle medical books.
sentences.chinese: 這家書店不經銷醫藥類書籍。

sentences.english: Two of the most popular non-fiction books of two thousand ten were about rock and roll stars.
sentences.chinese: 最流行的非小說類書籍兩千十兩名關於搖滾明星。

sentences.english: Now of such books as this I mean to say nothing.
sentences.chinese: 關於這類書我真沒有什麼話說。

sentences.english: This book is worthy in the same kind of books.
sentences.chinese: 該書是筆記小說史同類書中值得重視的一部。

sentences.english: Read career exploration books for insight into careers you might enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 讀一下職業教育類書籍以瞭解你可能喜歡的職業。

sentences.english: You can find these books in any local bookstore.
sentences.chinese: 你在當地的任一所書店都能找到此類書。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I'm not into that of books.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我對這類書不感興趣。

sentences.english: What was the last great non-fiction book that you read?
sentences.chinese: 哪一本書是你最近讀過的最好的非小說類書？

sentences.english: It is a page-turner and is the most attractive non-fiction book I've read this year.
sentences.chinese: 這是我今年看過的非小說類書中最引人入勝的一本。

sentences.english: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀保健類書籍時要小心，你可能死於錯誤印刷。

sentences.english: He’s the author of four books on database development and numerous articles.
sentences.chinese: 他是4本數據庫開發類書籍及數篇文章的作者。

sentences.english: It's worthwhile reading books on popular science.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀科普類書籍是值得的。

sentences.english: We don't handle that sort of book.
This kind of books is usually written for children.
sentences.chinese: 這類書通常是爲孩子們寫的。？

definition: Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
the four book depositories, namely: classics 經|经, history 史, philosophy 子[zi3], belles-lettres 集
